org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history

Class EventCountUserHistorySummarizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history.EventCountUserHistorySummarizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserHistorySummarizer

    @Shareable
public final class EventCountUserHistorySummarizer
extends Object
implements UserHistorySummarizer

    Summarize a history by counting all events referencing an item. The history can be filtered by type prior to counting.
